document.title: Health Education Content Standards for California Public Schools, Kindergarten Through Grade Twelve

F8E4FC60DFE30131913F68A86D17958E.description: Support peers in school and community activities.

F8E4A6F0DFE30131913E68A86D17958E.description: Object appropriately to teasing of peers that is based on personal characteristics.

F8E45F60DFE30131913D68A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F8E3A540DFE30131913B68A86D17958E.description: Manage emotions appropriately in a variety of situations.

F8E34C60DFE30131913A68A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F8E2FF40DFE30131913968A86D17958E.description: Describe how to make a commitment to be a good friend.

F8E2BC40DFE30131913868A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F8E277D0DFE30131913768A86D17958E.description: Use a decision-making process for solving problems with peers and family members.

F8E22ED0DFE30131913668A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F8E1E160DFE30131913568A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate how to ask for help from trusted adults or friends.

F8E19C00DFE30131913468A86D17958E.description: Identify and demonstrate ways to express needs and wants appropriately.

F8E14EB0DFE30131913368A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F8E10560DFE30131913268A86D17958E.description: Identify people in the community who are caring, supportive, and trustworthy.

F8E0BF70DFE30131913168A86D17958E.description: Discuss ways to obtain information from family, school personnel, health professionals, and other responsible adults.

F8E06530DFE30131913068A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8E00B40DFE30131912F68A86D17958E.description: Identify internal and external factors that influence mental, emotional, and social health.

F8DFB9B0DFE30131912E68A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8DF7A50DFE30131912D68A86D17958E.description: Describe the characteristics of a trusted friend and adult.

F8DF3A60DFE30131912C68A86D17958E.description: Identify the positive ways that peers and family members show support, care, and appreciation for one another.

F8DEF990DFE30131912B68A86D17958E.description: Describe how to work and play cooperatively.

F8DEB610DFE30131912A68A86D17958E.description: Identify positive and negative ways of dealing with stress.

F8DE6110DFE30131912968A86D17958E.description: List healthy ways to express affection, love, friendship, and concern.

F8DE0EF0DFE30131912868A86D17958E.description: Discuss how to show respect for similarities and differences between and among individuals and groups.

F8DDC6E0DFE30131912768A86D17958E.description: Identify feelings and emotions associated with loss or grief.

F8DD8170DFE30131912668A86D17958E.description: Identify characteristics of a responsible family member.

F8DD3960DFE30131912568A86D17958E.description: Identify changes that occur within families.

F8DCF100DFE30131912468A86D17958E.description: Explain the importance of talking with parents or trusted adults about feelings.

F8DCA670DFE30131912368A86D17958E.description: Explain what it means to be emotionally or mentally healthy.

F8DC1960DFE30131912168A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F8DB8E50DFE30131911F68A86D17958E.description: Evaluate why one person's medicines may not be safe for another person.

F8DB2BC0DFE30131911E68A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F8DAD3A0DFE30131911D68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate communication skills to alert an adult about unsafe situations involving drugs or medicines.

F8DA8610DFE30131911C68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate refusal skills to resist an offer to use drugs or inappropriate medicines.

F8DA44A0DFE30131911B68A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F8DA0380DFE30131911A68A86D17958E.description: Identify parents, guardians, and trusted adults who can provide accurate information and guidance regarding medicines.

F8D9BE40DFE30131911968A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8D97610DFE30131911868A86D17958E.description: Identify refusal skills when confronted or pressured to use alcohol, tobacco, or other drugs (e.g., use a clear "no" statement, walk or run away, change subject, delay).

F8D92920DFE30131911768A86D17958E.description: Identify rules for taking medicine at school and at home.

F8D8E320DFE30131911668A86D17958E.description: Explain why it is important to follow the medical recommendations for prescription and nonprescription medicines.

F8D894A0DFE30131911568A86D17958E.description: Explain why it is dangerous to taste, swallow, sniff, or play with unknown substances.

F8D82990DFE30131911468A86D17958E.description: Identify that a drug is a chemical that changes how the body and brain work.

F8D7D280DFE30131911368A86D17958E.description: Explain why household products are harmful if ingested or inhaled.

F8D78600DFE30131911268A86D17958E.description: Distinguish between helpful and harmful substances (including alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs).

F8D741C0DFE30131911168A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F8D6BE40DFE30131910F68A86D17958E.description: Explain to others what is enjoyable about physical activity.

F8D67A80DFE30131910E68A86D17958E.description: Practice making healthy eating choices with friends and family.

F8D62480DFE30131910D68A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F8D5C430DFE30131910C68A86D17958E.description: Participate in physical activities with friends and family.

F8D57060DFE30131910B68A86D17958E.description: Examine the criteria for choosing a nutritious snack.

F8D4A3F0DFE30131910868A86D17958E.description: Examine the importance of eating a nutritious breakfast every day.

F8D45170DFE30131910768A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F8D40980DFE30131910668A86D17958E.description: Set a short-term goal to participate daily in vigorous physical activity.

F8D3C960DFE30131910568A86D17958E.description: Set a short-term goal to choose healthy foods for snacks and meals.

F8D38680DFE30131910468A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F8D342C0DFE30131910368A86D17958E.description: Identify safe ways to increase physical activity.

F8D2F890DFE30131910268A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast healthy and less-healthy food choices for a variety of settings.

F8D29A10DFE30131910168A86D17958E.description: Use a decision-making process to select healthy foods.

F8D23800DFE30131910068A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F8D1F5A0DFE3013190FF68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate how to ask family members for healthy food options.

F8D1ADC0DFE3013190FE68A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F8D16E70DFE3013190FD68A86D17958E.description: Identify resources for reliable information about healthy foods.

F8D127C0DFE3013190FC68A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8D0E120DFE3013190FB68A86D17958E.description: Discuss how family, friends, and media influence food choices.

F8D097A0DFE3013190FA68A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8D04F30DFE3013190F968A86D17958E.description: Explain how both physical activity and eating habits can affect a person's health.

F8D00E40DFE3013190F868A86D17958E.description: Identify and explore opportunities outside of school for regular participation in physical activity.

F8CFCDB0DFE3013190F768A86D17958E.description: Identify a variety of healthy snacks.

F8CF8880DFE3013190F668A86D17958E.description: Describe how to keep food safe from harmful germs.

F8CF3C40DFE3013190F568A86D17958E.description: Describe the benefits of drinking water in amounts consistent with current research-based health guidelines.

F8CED520DFE3013190F468A86D17958E.description: List the benefits of healthy eating (including beverages and snacks).

F8CE8AB0DFE3013190F368A86D17958E.description: Discuss the benefits of eating a nutritious breakfast every day.

F8CE3170DFE3013190F268A86D17958E.description: Identify the number of servings of food from each food group that a child needs daily.

F8CDE400DFE3013190F168A86D17958E.description: Classify various foods into appropriate food groups.

F8CD97D0DFE3013190F068A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.
